name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Developer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in full-stack development, focusing on **C++**, **Python**, and **React** technologies. Proficient in designing and implementing scalable microservices architectures and event-driven systems, ensuring high performance and security in applications. Demonstrated expertise in **Git** for version control and collaboration, along with familiarity with integration tools such as **RabbitMQ** for messaging and **Cassandra** for database solutions.

Skilled in leveraging **Kubernetes** and **OpenStack** for container orchestration and cloud deployment, enhancing the scalability and availability of applications. Knowledgeable in software design principles and team collaboration, driving projects to completion while adhering to best practices. I communicate effectively in English and possess a proven track record of working in diverse teams across the healthcare and financial sectors. My background also includes experience with CI/CD automation, increasing development efficiency and operational excellence.
